name: true chaos
description:
true chaos is a game about causing chaos & wreaking havoc in multiple locations

originally created for the Brackeys Jam 2021.2

controls

WASD or arrow keys - movement
space - dash
left mouse button - laser
right mouse button - grab sphere
N - next level (only available after 35 seconds of the level's launch)
R - restarts the level
ESC - pause menu

known issues

#1 - explosion sound seems to break the sound barrier on WebGL
#2 - perfomance issues on the WebGL build if there are too many particles, doesnt seem to replicate on the Windows build (only one I can test it on)
